member.summary: Represents a Document Object Model for a QIF file.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.Import(System.String)
member.summary: Imports the specified file and replaces the current instance properties with details found in the import file.
member.param: Name of the file to import.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.Import(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Imports a stream in a QIF format and replaces the current instance properties with details found in the import stream.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.Export(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Exports the current instance properties to the specified file.
member.param: Encoding to use when writing the file, defaults to
member.remarks: This will overwrite an existing file.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.ExportFile(QifApi.QifDom,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Exports the specified instance properties to the specified file.
member.param: Encoding to use when writing the file, defaults to
member.remarks: This will overwrite an existing file.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.ImportFile(System.String)
member.summary: Imports a QIF file and returns a QifDom object.
member.returns: A QifDom object of transactions imported.

member.name: M:QifApi.QifDom.ImportFile(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Imports a QIF file stream reader and returns a QifDom object.
member.param: The stream reader pointing to an underlying QIF file to import.
member.returns: A QifDom object of transactions imported.
